summary: Because I couldn't find SOS on the Nexus mod Website, I decided to upload it from the original page which will contain the credits for this mod.
descriptionHtml:
Because I couldn't find SOS on the Nexus mod Website, I decided to upload it from the original page which will contain the credits for this mod.([url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/[/url]) If the moderators decide to take down this page I will understand. Know that I only did this for convenience of Skyrim players who were having troubles installing it.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Credits(quoted from the aforementioned link)
<br /><br />
<br /><br />"We would also like to thank the following people that in someway or another, helped us developing it, just by sharing their knowledge:[list]
<br /><br />[*]Fore
<br /><br />[*]Theru
<br /><br />[/list]Thanks for FaerieXDecay, for providing us with beautiful screenshots! Thanks to Earrindo, Zor2k13, and XunAmarox, for fixing the SoS Light esp and meshes! Thanks to h38fh2mf and Ashal for [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/484-papyrusutil/]PapyrusUtil[/url] and the provided support Thanks to jonwd7 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24020/]Brawl Bugs Patch - Plugins - Modder Resource[/url] Thanks to Shiene, Tiranno_71, Huili and forceet24 for their translations. Thanks to everyone that is helping this project to grow and took initiative to make new mods to work with Schlongs of Skyrim Also thanks to the Baraboards and [url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/]Hall of Torque[/url] communities, for giving their support. Without them probably SOS would never come to exist. Thanks to all our Beta Testers, that gave us feedback and helped at detecting bugs. Thanks to the moderators at The Nexus, that helped us clarifying if the mod could be uploaded there. They proved themselves to be quite reasonable. Thanks to everyone in general, that showed interest in having a rigged and animated penis. Thanks to all the Mods and Modders that served as an inspiration in taking the male mods, one step forward. And finally ofc, thanks to Bethesda (although they should have included this feature in the game xD)"
author: b3lisario
